title: El Salvador: Citi Presents a New Exclusive Card for Its Clients
summary: San Salvador, El Salvador - Citi presented its new and exclusive credit card, Citi LifeMiles Infinite.
tag-1: El Salvador: Citi Presents a New Exclusive Card for Its Clients
tag-3: San Salvador, El Salvador – Citi presented its new and exclusive credit card, Citi LifeMiles Infinite.
tag-4: With the Citi LifeMiles Infinite credit card, Citi clients have access to more privileges and continued growth in a world of distinction and prestige.
tag-6: As part of the Visa family, the new Citi LifeMiles Infinite credit card brings with it a series of additional benefits that offer added value to consumers with high purchasing power:
tag-7: These and many other benefits are only part of what the Citi LifeMiles Infinite card has to offer. Clients of this new card will receive preferential treatment every time they travel, improved benefits and countless exclusive privileges.
tag-8: "At Citi we are always searching for ways to offer our clients the best products. With the new Citi LifeMiles Infinite credit card, we are bringing them access to a world full of privileges and benefits that are unique in the region," remarked Marco Lopez, Director Credit Cards, Citi Central America.
tag-9: "For the airlines that belong to the AviancaTaca Holding, it is a pleasure to be part of this partnership to benefit our mutual clients with Citi, with whom we have built a strong business relationship over time," noted Mauricio Angulo, Director of Business Administration and Development, LifeMiles. "Both organizations work hard to be options that provide high added value to their clients, in accordance with their tastes and preferences."
tag-10: For his part, Rogelio Sanchez, Central America Executive Director at Visa Inc., Latin America and the Caribbean, added: "Cardholders with high purchasing power represent an increasingly strategic segment for Visa, thanks to this market's constant growth. This new card launch demonstrates our commitment to offering a portfolio of products with an integral benefit platform that is compatible with consumers' lifestyle and fulfills their requirements for peace of mind while traveling and making purchases."
tag-11: If you still do not have a Citi Credit Card you may request one by calling 2212-2000 or visiting www.citi.com.sv. If you are not a LifeMiles member, join for free at LifeMiles.com.
tag-12: For more information about the travel benefits provided by the Visa Infinite card, please visit www.visa-infinite.com.2
